description:
Experience all-day dryness and comfort with the Cargo Trek Pants. With 8 zippered pockets, you'll have your essentials securely stored, ready to conquer every adventure. They are further enhanced with remarkable 4-way stretch, providing you with unparalleled mobility. Their exceptional durability gives you the freedom to explore without hesitation.

  • Made from an abrasion resistant blend of recycled nylon and spandex
  • Fabric has built in 4-way mechanical stretch to move with you
  • 8 zippered pockets keep valuables secure
  • Integrated adjustable belt to get the fit just right
name: Tilley Cargo Trek Pant - Women's
